name: tool_model_to_pipeline
description: SiMa.ai ONNX Model to Pipeline Conversion Tool

installation.post-message:
[bold]Supported Yolo models:[/bold]
- yolov8n, yolov8m, yolov8l
- yolov9t, yolov9s, yolov9m, yolov9c
- yolov10n, yolov10s, yolov10m, yolov10b, yolov10x
- yolo11n, yolo11s, yolo11m, yolo11l

[bold]Run pipeline creation (example with YOLOv9c):[/bold]

[green]cd tool-model-to-pipeline
sima-model-to-pipeline model-to-pipeline --config-yaml samples/yolov9c.yaml[/green]
